resp = client.indices.put_index_template(
    name="timeseries_template",
    index_patterns=[
        "timeseries-*"
    ],
    template={
        "settings": {
            "number_of_shards": 1,
            "number_of_replicas": 1,
            "index.lifecycle.name": "timeseries_policy",
            "index.lifecycle.rollover_alias": "timeseries"
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
